name: GitHubTag
description: Create a Tag in GitHub commit
author: Mikael Krief

inputs.name: githubEndpoint
inputs.label: GitHub Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select the service endpoint for your GitHub connection. To create one, click the Manage link and create a new service endpoint.

inputs.name: tag
inputs.label: Tag
inputs.helpMarkDown: Tag to associate to commit, default value $(Build.BuildNumber) for tag the commit with the current build number

inputs.name: repositoryName
inputs.label: Repository full name
inputs.helpMarkDown: Full name of the GitHub repository e.g. name/myrepository, default value $(Build.Repository.Name)

inputs.name: commmit
inputs.label: Commit
inputs.helpMarkDown: The SHA Commit id. default value $(Build.SourceVersion)
